statements: SELECT * FROM celebrities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, social_media_followers FROM celebrities WHERE social_media_followers > 10000;
SELECT id, name, social_media_followers FROM celebrities ORDER BY social_media_followers DESC;
SELECT name FROM celebrities WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT id, name FROM celebrities WHERE social_media_followers BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT * FROM celebrities ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT name, social_media_followers FROM celebrities WHERE social_media_followers > 10000 ORDER BY social_media_followers ASC
SELECT name, social_media_followers FROM celebrities WHERE social_media_followers BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY social_media_followers DESC
SELECT name, social_media_followers FROM celebrities WHERE name IN ('Tom Hanks', 'Jennifer Aniston', 'Brad Pitt')
SELECT name, social_media_followers FROM celebrities WHERE social_media_followers > 5000 AND name NOT LIKE '%Kim%' ORDER BY social_media_followers ASC
SELECT * FROM Celebrities;
SELECT name, social_media_followers FROM Celebrities;
SELECT social_media_followers, name FROM Celebrities;
SELECT id, name, social_media_followers FROM Celebrities WHERE social_media_followers > 10000;
SELECT * FROM SocialMedia WHERE platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT name, social_media_followers FROM Celebrities WHERE social_media_followers > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, social_media_followers FROM Celebrities ORDER BY social_media_followers DESC;
SELECT platform, followers_count FROM SocialMedia WHERE followers_count < 5000 ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT c.name, s.followers_count FROM Celebrities c JOIN SocialMedia s ON c.name = s.username;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities;
SELECT name, followers_count FROM Celebrities WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT name, social_media_handle FROM Celebrities ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM InstagramFollowers JOIN Celebrities ON InstagramFollowers.celebrity_id = Celebrities.id;
SELECT c.name, t.followers_count FROM Celebrities c JOIN TwitterFollowers t ON c.id = t.celebrity_id WHERE t.followers_count > 5000;
SELECT name, followers_count FROM Celebrities WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT name, social_media_handle FROM Celebrities WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT c.name, i.followers_count FROM Celebrities c JOIN InstagramFollowers i ON c.id = i.celebrity_id WHERE i.followers_count >= 5000 ORDER BY i.followers_count DESC;
SELECT c.id, c.name, TwitterFollowers.followers_count FROM Celebrities c LEFT JOIN TwitterFollowers ON c.id = TwitterFollowers.celebrity_id WHERE TwitterFollowers.followers_count IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE id IN (SELECT celebrity_id FROM TwitterFollowers WHERE followers_count > 2000) ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM actors ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT id, name, social_media_followers FROM celebrities WHERE social_media_followers > 10000;
SELECT musician_name, genre FROM musicians WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE sport = 'Football' AND social_media_followers < 5000;
SELECT actor_name, rating FROM actors ORDER BY social_media_followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT id, name FROM actors ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT musician_name, genre FROM musicians WHERE social_media_followers > 10000;
SELECT athlete_name, sport FROM athletes WHERE sport = 'Football';
SELECT id, name, social_media_followers FROM celebrities WHERE social_media_followers BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT name, social_media_followers FROM celebrities ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM celebrities_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT celebrities.name, instagram_followers.followers_count FROM celebrities JOIN instagram_followers ON celebrities.id = instagram_followers.celebrity_id;
SELECT celebrities.name, twitter_followers.followers_count FROM celebrities JOIN twitter_followers ON celebrities.id = twitter_followers.celebrity_id WHERE twitter_followers.followers_count > 100000;
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT name, social_media_followers FROM celebrities ORDER BY social_media_followers DESC;
SELECT celebrities.name, celebrities_info.age, celebrities_info.country FROM celebrities JOIN celebrities_info ON celebrities.id = celebrities_info.celebrity_id WHERE celebrities_info.age > 30;

SELECT celebrities.name, instagram_followers.followers_count AS instagram_followers, twitter_followers.followers_count AS twitter_followers FROM celebrities JOIN instagram_followers ON celebrities.id = instagram_followers.celebrity_id JOIN twitter_followers ON celebrities.id = twitter_followers.celebrity_id;

SELECT celebrities.name, SUM(instagram_followers.followers_count) AS total_instagram_followers, SUM(twitter_followers.followers_count) AS total_twitter_followers FROM celebrities JOIN instagram_followers ON celebrities.id = instagram_followers.celebrity_id JOIN twitter_followers ON celebrities.id = twitter_followers.celebrity_id GROUP BY celebrities.name ORDER BY total_instagram_followers DESC;
